featured.text: Later children may make good salespersons because persuasion may have been the only tool they had to deal with older siblings.

definition.zh_def: 兄弟姐妹，指同一父母所生的孩子。
definition.en_def: A sibling is a person who shares at least one parent with another person.
definition.example: I have two siblings, a brother and a sister.
